ISSUE.TITLE: Now upload failed error, but little details
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I'm using now to deploy a static web site. During the deployment, something went wrong: ![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/393660/26458848/1e476b8e-413a-11e7-909b-c08702a7b01e.png) I've got little to no idea what "Response error" means here. Well, I can guess it means the CLI didn't like what it heard back from the server, but I don't know how to go forward in terms of correcting it.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix `content-type: application/json` header being added even if body is `undefined` (#583)
